website_summaries.verdict: One of the best waterproof dog beds available for online purchase, this comfortable model is sure to impress.
pros: Includes waterproof inner liner for ultimate pet protection
Comes with water-resistant and tear-resistant cover that is removable and machine-washable
cons: Fabric does not hide fur or slobber
Outside cover has a tendency to rip

customer_reviews.title: Large too small for 70lbs german shepherd
customer_reviews.text: Size large is a bit too small for 70 lbs German Shepherd, although it doesn't seem to bother her :) great, good quality bed for the price, just wish I got xl so she can stretch out on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ania

customer_reviews.title: Our Big-Head Yellow Lab Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: Our yellow Labrador Retriever, Zed, is a lounging connoisseur and loves his new PetFusion Ultimate Dog Bed! Here's a brief video of the unboxing and setup process (it's a snap), and - of course - some action shots of Zed's lounging in action. Zed is on the larger size (90lbs) and we've observed that if a dog bed doesn't support him well he'll migrate elsewhere (like the couch!). As much as I enjoy my 90lb lap-dog, it's nice to finally find a bed that's Zed approved - the memory foam really seems to do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfy. Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: My 85lb dog loves his bed! Great quality and the memory foam seems to hold up really well. Spent over 2 months researching for a durable, comfy bed and glad I found this.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Cover is falling apart
customer_reviews.text: I certainly didn't expect a $120 dog bed to be falling apart at the seams in 9 months. The seams are all splitting, exposing the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: BPO

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Broke First Time I Used It. Waste of Money.
customer_reviews.text: The zipper is cheap and broke the first time I attempted to unzip the cover so I could wash the bed. Now the bustle won't stay inside the bed and that's the only reason I bought is. Now I have a flat, broken mat my dog won't even lay on because he like to curl up inside something.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Much better quality from dog beds I’ve been buying from Costco ...
customer_reviews.text: The cover is made of cheap material. Ripped in two places. Also, allows liquid to seep into foam matteres. Much better quality from dog beds I’ve been buying from Costco for years. There are two components to a dog bed. 1) premanufatured mattress, 2) the cover. Since they don’t manufacture the foam mattress. All they do is get a cover - and even that is poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S

customer_reviews.title: Need a medium size
customer_reviews.text: The bed seems to be well made and a quality item. The reason for the 3 star review is that neither the small or large size got my dog. I have a 40 lb mixed breed dog. I originally purchased the large as it was the second smallest size. It was huge - way too big for my dog and took up too much room. Returned that and purchased the small size. It's just too small for my dog. I'm frustrated. I need a medium!
customer_reviews.author: Big Papa

customer_reviews.title: Happy dog!
customer_reviews.text: These beds are great and are definitely doggy approved (see picture for proof)! The foam is high quality and is great for both of our dogs 55 and 65 lbs. I highly recommend this product because I tested it out myself for a few minutes. I purchased the brown color and it looks great. Hope this helps! !
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Bed was great until our dog had her first accident on it today. 3 days after return policy ended. Urine soaked right through both protective covers and into the foam. Foam is ruined so therefore the bed is too. Very expensive bed to not last longer than 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bed with one flaw
customer_reviews.text: My 50 pound springer spaniel fits nicely into a large bed with extra room for circling and changing positions. He loves this bed and uses the rolled top all the time to rest his head on. Seems to be a good bed. I've washed and dried the cover and it laundered well. My problem is that the fabric catches and holds dog hair, and it's visible. Slobber stains also show. I bought gray. Other pet beds we've owned either don't adhere so much hair, or it's not visible. This is the reason I gave it only 3 stars. I'd MUCH prefer a different fabric cover that's more forgiving.
customer_reviews.author: weatherfield

customer_reviews.title: which makes the bed useless because the armrests fall apart
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this dog bed very long and the zipper has already broke, which makes the bed useless because the armrests fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Working for my Great Dane
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today but already five stars for finally being able to find a bed that my 182 lb Great Dane fits in. So far so good. Seems to have a good quality fabric and I even tested the density and firmness of the foam. I did not sink to the bottom even though I weigh less than my dog. She seems pretty comfy in it. If I could change one thing it would be the small bolster parts in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni J.

customer_reviews.title: Not really waterproof and my dogs like to eat it
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a dog, and I don't get dog brains. I have five dogs and have had about 10 beds. This one looks great, it feels great, and the dogs use it as a chew toy. And, if they're not busy destroying it, they sleep in it. One problem, the cover is NOT waterproof. It is water resistant. One dog got sick and the cover was saturated by the time it was noticed. After washing and drying, it looks ok, but I'm sure a dog can smell it. So, ok, not waterproof, and edible
customer_reviews.author: HomerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This dog bed is worth the money. It is well designed and the materials are very good quality. It's very simple to take the bed apart and put it back together. There is even a slip cover for the memory foam pad to provide additional protection. The memory foam base can be removed and inserted back into the cover separately from the bolster piece. These are the only two pieces of the bed. I have a 70 lb APBT and I bought the large size. She fits in the bed perfectly. I wash the bed cover one per week and it has held up over time (I air dry it) going on 7 months since I purchased the bed.
customer_reviews.author: SLM

customer_reviews.title: Our puppy is happy
customer_reviews.text: My shepherd pup gives it two paws up. She had been using a bed we got from Costco and seems to like it, but she gets-up at night and lays on the floor. I think she just gets hot. She sleeps all night on this bed and looks adorable. The only concern I have is the size. She is now six months old and around sixty pounds and fits nicely. I hope she still fits well when she fills out.
customer_reviews.author: R.Allen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Saint Bernards!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so in love with this bed! It is actually solid memory foam! The last bed we bought claimed to be, but wasn't. We have a 7 year old Saint Bernard (160 lbs). This bed is the perfect size for him to stretch right out. Also, the quality of the cover is very nice. It's a thick canvas, so I'm sure it will stand up to being washed multiple times. I wash the bedding once a week so I will update later, but with the quality of the fabric and stitching, I don't think there will be a problem. If you have a big (and I mean BIG) dog, this bed is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Internet Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I’d like a new bed, or a refund.
customer_reviews.text: Had this bed for barely a month before the zipper for the bolster broke, and can no longer be zipped shut.
customer_reviews.author: vdot

customer_reviews.title: Look further for higher quality
customer_reviews.text: Washed the bed -- once -- on a gentle cycle and air dried. The zipper never worked again. May be able to replace the cover, but bummed that at this cost the cover couldn't handle one wash.
customer_reviews.author: SpeacialK

customer_reviews.title: Love the cushion, but think the bolster should be higher
customer_reviews.text: The cushion in this bed is great, particularly for older pets. I have a 17-pound, 9 year-old dachshund and the small bed fits him well and he seems to like the cushion. My only negative is that the bolster around the bed is too short to be something that a dog who likes that "snuggle feeling" will really love and generally that is why you buy a bolster bed - to give your pet that sense of security that a bolster provides. The bed is well-made and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lee

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small
customer_reviews.text: Thought this maybe helpful, for folks with Large Dogs. I have a 55 lb, rather small German Shepard. I ordered the Large size for her, and she could not fully stretch out. I then ordered the Extra Large, and she is in heaven. She can stretch out, curl up against the bolsters...what ever she wants. I think a normal sized Shepard, would need the XL . We love the bed.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT take the bumper out of the sides
customer_reviews.text: You will never get it back in. I take the bottom out - that's easy but the sides NOT AT ALL. I threw the first bed away because I couldn't get the bumper back in. Now with the second one, I just remove the bottom foam and wash it as is. I like the material - it doesn't attract dog hair and it's very rugged. But you will regret it if you take out the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Cut corners low quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these in 2018 and love it BUT I just ordered one for my new dog and the pad is half the thickeness and the cover was saggy around it. I waited 4 days to see if the foam would expand more and it didn’t. They clearly cut corners and the price didn’t drop. D not order this bed for that reason alone if you are a new customer the quality is much lower than it used to be. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindzy

customer_reviews.title: Quality dog bed ❤️🐶🐾
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice bed. Spendy, but perfect for my beloved senior basset hound. She has had a back injury and arthritis. I noticed she wasn’t using her bed and was continuously changing positions to try to get comfortable. She’s on daily pain medicine, glucosamine and vitamins. She is my certified ESA and want only the best for her. It supports her well and she hopped in right away. I can’t comment on ease of cleaning as I haven’t washed it yet. I ordered another memory foam bed with this one and there was no comparison- this won hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Gemella

customer_reviews.title: Happy Dane Happy Life!
customer_reviews.text: This is a Jumbo Size Review! My Great Dane loves her new bed. She could curl up on a XL but this Jumbo lets her stretch her long legs above and beyond! She uses the bolsters as head support and snuggles. I recommend the Jumbo size for any Great Dane or dog that like room to move. Top notch quality and quick ship. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: BJB

customer_reviews.title: ... is a high quality bed and we are very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews state this is a high quality bed and we are very pleased with it! Our pup immediately plopped onto it and didn't move. We wanted a bed that really provided comfortable support that would last. We looked at a lot of beds in stores and found most of them didn't provide great support and still cost around $100. This one delivers solid support and feels very comfortable. Being orthopedic memory foam, I anticipate it will last quite awhile. Totally worth every penny! As a reference, our pup is 40 pounds and fits nicely in the Large size.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Large, too firm and bolsters too high.
customer_reviews.text: This "orthopedic" bed was just too firm all together - no give at all. I have a Doberman mix and the bolsters were way too high for him to lie his head. He couldn't figure out how to get comfortable. It made me so sad that he liked his old cheap smelly $40 Costco bed better than this almost $200 one. It was also larger than I expected. Too big for my 65 lb dog. The grey color was nice and it was pretty easy to take cover off to wash. Waterproof-ness seemed ok.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bed!!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly an amazing dog bed!! We’ve never been able to get our 5 year old lab Dutch to sleep on any dog bed. He’d rather sleep with us or on the couch. Unfortunately, he had to have a leg and shoulder amputated 3 days ago due to bone cancer. We purchased the bed praying that he would sleep on it and be comfortable. He loves his new bed!!! It is so comfortable and just like sleeping on a bed. Thank you for a wonderful product from our fur baby Dutch and his parents!!
customer_reviews.author: jl

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bed
customer_reviews.text: My tiny puppy is a dane mix. She is only 105 pounds. I bought the jumbo sized bed since that is what it called for for her size. As you can see she fits in there with plenty of room. She did act a little funny when she stepped on it for the first time due to the extra bounce in the material. Now she has no problem. My son, who is in his 30s, and who is no small person, actually laid on it and remarked how comfortable it is. It was a little more expensive than other beds. But, as the saying goes... You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: You can purchase a bed much better than this for the price at any store. The material is like umbrella and I’m sure dog nails will go through it. Also the bottom is foam rubber that needs to be stuffed into an opening that doesn’t zip at least 3/4 of the way around. If it wasn’t a pain to repack I’d return it. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Grammygirl

customer_reviews.title: Best Pet Supply Purchase...Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best pet purchase I have ever made! I was concerned about spending so much for dog beds (I bought 2!) but my two girls LOVE the beds. They are both heavy shedders and droolers so it is crazy nice to be able to zip off the covers and wash them. If you dog is anything like mine and love to lean their heads on things, they will fall in love with these beds. Winner!
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Wished I had bought a different one
customer_reviews.text: More difficult to assemble than another bed I have and the Sandstone cover that was described as plush was woven fabric and with a cream-colored Golden-Retriever, shows dirt very bad—it needs to be washed daily, but hard to disassemble and put back compared to other brand. I wrote customer support and asked what was plush about it—I expected fabric to be plush? They never replied and I told them about the problem with showing dirt and how do I order a new one. Wish I had my other brand that is much easier! Just bought another cover, so out $34 more.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: ***update: I contacted the seller and received AMAZING customer service as well as replacement covers being sent in the mail. I've updated my rating to reflect the customer service. Looks great, comfortable. Not very durable. My dog has had his since Christmas morning. So 11 days. The seem completely ripped open. Update: The third picture is the second bed that I purchased at the same time as the other. The first was the Large size and the seem split. On the small size, the Zipper broke. My small dog is a lap dog and has laid in this bed only a handful of times. You definitely do not get what you pay for with this product. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY! A bed that works for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: We have gone through tons of beds over the past 10 years with my two dogs. The washable ones never get truly clean unless they have a removable cover. The covers though are always paper thin and wear after a few washes (we wash about once a month). This cover is top quality and the thick 4" base is perfect for my aging pups. I purchased the Large size. It's fits my tall, 40 lb beagle and 14 pound pug with plenty of room for them. They love the thick bolster at the top to snuggle and I love that the bolster pillow is also removable. This bed is an amazing price for the size and quality of the bed!
customer_reviews.author: Jolena

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely yes
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this bed! We got an xlarge for the living room (brown), and a large for the bedroom (gray). Our dog loves this bed. She's a 36lbs griffon and is fully supported in both beds. She especially loves the sides. She spends about 10 minutes every night laying on her side just digging to China in the fold of the sides, and it's holding strong without a sign of wear. I wouldn't call this bed waterproof, but I'm going to use a duvet cover on them for easier washing. The beds are pricier than I would have liked, but at least I won't be needing to buy yet another cheap bed in just a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Chenevich

customer_reviews.title: As comfortable as my 4,000$ bed!
customer_reviews.text: My 100 lb lab has not moved since I set it up... he made himself comfortable right away. The memory foam is thick and very plush. I am more than pleased with this purchase. I won’t lie, spending over 200$ on a dog bed seemed crazy but it’s quality is worth the money. So far great product.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Cheap taffeta bottom fabric
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was a wonderful bed. Fabric on top was pretty tuff. Lasted 11 months. Fabric on the bottom of the cover is thin taffeta type that started to fray after 4 months . I repaired lasted a bit longer. Can not get ahold of the manufacturer representative. Ordered replacement cover in Sept. Now it I add starting to fray. Do not recommend. Looked through the Information. Forget the 24 month replacement. I never write comments on products, but after over $200 ,I am done. Would put no stars but it won't let me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and my dog loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Could not find a well padded, dog bed at the large pet stores but found this AKC approved one online.T he fleecy cover zips on and off for laundering, the thick, comfy cushion has a water resistant cover around it (also washable) and the bottom is thickly padded to keep your dog well supported and well off the floor. For dogs who like to prop their heads on a cushion as mine does this has a raised cushion around three sides, a dog sofa. Ruby just snuggles into her bed - so comfy looking I almost feel like snuggling in beside her. But seriously - terrific product, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tartan Mockingbird

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good dog bed
customer_reviews.text: So overall the bed was great, durable, and a nice design. However, I thought the color was going to be more of a cream but it was actually a light grey. It was also much larger than anticipated, way too large for my golden doodle. I felt the sizing was a bit off based on weight. We actually returned because she didn’t care for it and it took up too much room. But overall, a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Tomi Von Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly awesome comfy bed!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bed-soooo comfy looking for my 75 lb golden. Fits him just right. The memory foam is very firm so very supportive for his 12 year old bones! He loves his pillowed sides. My 10 yr old grandson loves to 'borrow' it to watch tv in! It would actually make a good camping bed for a child about 4! The fabric is tightly woven so even though he paws it a little to settle in it doesn't snag. I have thrown his fav blanket in it to make it more cozy and easier to keep clean. The cat wants to share!
customer_reviews.author: S. Roan

customer_reviews.title: What awesome customer service, and 2 yr warranty!
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with PetFusion's awesome customer service! Alexandra, from PetFusion, contacted me immediately regarding my question on their 2 yr warranty. I had purchased their pet bed 1.5 yrs ago. Alexandra was very professional and friendly towards my problem with their foam mattress becoming moldy. I have no idea how, but it was raining for the past 2 days. Bottom line - despite that Amazon had been wonderful, Alexandra offered, and insisted, to replace the old pet bed, and include a complementary pet blanket! PetFusion absolutely stands by their products! In less than a week, my 16 yr old Shih Tzu happily enjoyed his new PetFusion bed and blanket. Thank you PetFusion!
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Huge awesome bed!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the biggest option and I'm here to tell you, it'd be perfect for a 100-150 lb dog or 2-4 smaller dogs. It's also great quality, comfortable, and looks really nice. It's so huge though that we can't put it in our living room or my sons bedroom because it's eats all of the available floor space. Keep in mind I ordered the JUMBO. I wasn't thinking. Read the measurements and order accordingly. We won't be returning it, we just put it in our master bedroom where there's more room. Dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Boymom, RN

customer_reviews.title: Terrible material for a dog bed even though it seems well made
customer_reviews.text: My dog prefers the floor over this bed for some reason. She’s just not taking to it even after about 5 weeks. The canvas type material is also a nightmare. Hair sticks to it so bad. I have to lay a blanket on top of it otherwise it looks filthy (light color). Going forward I’ll continue to purchase the beds with a plush material cover vs the tight flat material. Especially for a bed that will be in the room where guests can see it. We’ve not had any accidents on it but it does seems well made. Unfortunately, I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof2

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Bought another one.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a dark brown one for an aging female who leaks. I do cover it with a towel and sheet for easier cleanup. But the other morning, she leaked a lot and my husband took off the sheet and said it must be waterproof, because the pee was just beaded up on the surface. I wiped it off, and appreciated the waterproofing. Hope it doesn’t wear off after machine washing. Also, VERY comfortable and supportive for senior dog and for me to sit next to her. Ended up purchasing another for our 1 year old puppy. Both dogs love these beds.
customer_reviews.author: MorningStar

customer_reviews.title: Decent bed. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: My 50lb German shepherd/cattle dog seemed to like the bed but The fabric ripped after 6 months. She’s not a destructive dog at all. Update: They replaced the cover very quickly. Excellent customer service. My dog enjoys the bed hopefully it just doesn’t get ripped again. She particularly likes the bolsters. When I removed the cover there was some evidence of moisture and dirt that entered from the bottom. I keep this bed on my covered patio. The anti skid on the bottom doesn’t work all that well. It slides around a good deal. Overall it’s a decent bed and like I said, the customer service is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Peison

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & well built, but cant remove excess fur
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it and everyone fights over laying in it. I love the foam and the sturdy back. My only compliant is that if you have a dog that sheds (I have Australian Shepherds), their fur is very difficult to get off of the cotton cover. Using a Lint brush on it didn’t work either. I also couldn’t get the excess fur off with a good washing. I wish the cover came in something easier to clean. Please don’t let my issues stop you from buying this nice sturdy bed for your dog. They fight over it.
customer_reviews.author: DaDB

customer_reviews.title: Might not be good for all breeds and ages
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product but my 16 year old Dachshund is not thrilled and prefers his old bed. The material is not as soft as on his old bed and the biggest issue is that it is a pretty difficult step for an older dog to jump into this bed as it is several inches off the ground thanks to the rather thick mattress. For dogs like Dachshunds that are at risk of bad injuries especially at an older age this could be a poor choice. If he were several years younger we would have kept it but sadly we must return it and find something more age and breed appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Mikeyt1818

customer_reviews.title: Get it.  My dogs loves it (and the blanket, too)
customer_reviews.text: I have a 60-something pound Beagle (possibly Basset Hound) mix and purchased the large bed. Fits perfectly for our hefty boy. He has a torn ACL and has a hard time jumping up on the couch or beds. He has torn up other beds -- but not this one. He just wants to lay in it. It's very sweet and he obviously loves lounging in it. Even though this is the most expensive bed we've ever bought for him, we're thinking about purchasing another for upstairs so we don't have to keep moving it up and down the stairs. I also purchased the cozy blanket; he seems to appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Lamb13

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value, Greyhound LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: We tried a couple beds before investing in this one. Others had not provided enough padding, another had lots of padding (polyfil) but no spine support, and finally we found this. Our 70lbs greyhound was out cold 5 minutes after stepping on it and it’s absolutely his favorite place in the house. We don’t allow our dog on our bed, but with this I don’t think he’s missing out! And he seems to enjoy when we cuddle with him in the extra space. As pictured, the JUMBO is large enough for our big dog AND my 6’7” husband to cuddle in comfort. I have also napped with our Grey in it and it is delightful. Best naps of my life!
customer_reviews.author: Dew Drop

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the large size in dark brown for my English bulldog that weights around 58 pounds. It's a good size for him to stretch out on, with some extra space. The color is a classy nice brown color. I am impressed with the quality and how easy it is to put together. Time will tell how it holds up and washes. He sheds and the material is easy to vacuum unlike many other beds. He was upset that we moved his old bed out of the room, but after going back and forth to both beds, seems to prefer the new bed. Looking at buying a 2nd bed once I see how this one holds up.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: THERE'S NO PADDING INCLUDED!!!
customer_reviews.text: What incredibly false advertising! For the cost of this thing, the padding should be included! It says it's included BUT IT'S NOT! I just opens mine today and it's going right back to Amazon! What a waste of time and money this was!
customer_reviews.author: Maryland Techy

customer_reviews.title: XL is perfect for a Great Dane!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a dog bed that fits my 160lb Great Dane! This is a pricy bed but I was tired of buying beds that he would sink to the floor in. I came home today and he wouldn’t get off the bed because he was so comfortable. I put a few blankets to make it a little more cozy but I think this bed will last. The package was really heavy when it arrived but the assembly was super easy. (The bolsters are already in the bed, you just put in the memory foam portion)
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: It's HUGE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog bed I've ever purchased so far. I love my babies so much and I always want the best for them so I have been buying beds like every 3-5 months for them. Every bed disappoints me after a few weeks because it gets torn and smelly. Hopefully this one will withstand the Bully/Boxer life.
customer_reviews.author: UNCLUVA

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves the fact it’s so cooling during summertimes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a large size of these beds for a 11lb cat which seems to own it comfortably when stretched. My cat always preferred my bed or the floor during summertimes, except for this bed, which he now chooses to sleep on every night. I figured he likes this one so much because it’s breathable and keeps him cool. I wish there was a smaller “pillow-like” option for cats (I used one of my own little ones). But I would still buy this bed otherwise for its durability (sturdy stitches etc) and quality memory foam. It’s just one of those really products which makes you like the company for being so fair to the customer.
customer_reviews.author: maria g

customer_reviews.title: So so, designed by someone who probably doesn’t have a dog
customer_reviews.text: Best is okay! The white cover for the bed is Destined to be dirty. I wash it and in the same hour it’s dirty again. I wish they sold cover replacement for the cushion. My last bed was a velvet generic one from petco which was more easier to maintain. This material on the sides also is a magnet for loose fur. For the price + the cons, i would not recommend ! FYI as much as i clean and even with bleach. It won’t be back to white the cushion cover
customer_reviews.author: patrick Huang

customer_reviews.title: 2 dogs, neither want anything to do with it.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 medium to large breed dogs and neither want anything to do with this bed. They like to sprawl out and although this is large, they don’t seem to care for the sides. My main purpose was that my 12 year old Borador is no longer jumping up onto our bed. In lieu of sleeping on our carpet floor, I thought she might appreciate this. She hates it, hates walking on it, hates laying on it. It takes up too much space in our house too. I think I need to get one of those giant soft flat pillow like beds. She used to sleep on those.
customer_reviews.author: Klausferatu

customer_reviews.title: 2 inches short but company rectified problem
customer_reviews.text: Love the original dog bed. I had previously purchased one about a year ago and wanted another for another room. BUT, this purchase was 2 inches less wide than the original and advertised size. Not ready to take it apart and wrap up to send back. Just want the manufacturer to know and hope I will get some kind of a refund. Know my dog won't be as happy with size but guess she'll adjust and curl up. Next Day---Company called me and we settled on a solution and I am a happy customer. Wonderful company to do business with.
customer_reviews.author: va

customer_reviews.title: Wish I got it years ago
customer_reviews.text: 95lbs Labrador Best dog bed I’ve ever got Jumbo she can lay any directions or her and my sister dog both fit. She isn’t slow and wobbly getting up so it obviously helps keep pressure off her joints. The bolster are nice she like to rest her head and I can put a blanket on top and tuck it under the bolster. After 2 months I have no negative
customer_reviews.author: Charlab

customer_reviews.title: RIDICULOUS.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you PetFusion for making me feel stupid because I didn't get an advanced degree in engineering or architecture. It was going to be a major task to assemble this dog bed, so I folded it all up, put it back in the box and am returning it. Why does everything have to be so complicated? I'm gonna ask my dead grandmothers to get together and sew me up a nice dog bed. That would be easier than putting this thing together.
customer_reviews.author: IDLF

customer_reviews.title: The forever kind of investment. Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this bed. We have had it for FOUR YEARS now and the base is still firm and thick. The cover is an easy process to slip on and off - I’ve never had a problem with the zipper, I just pull it together a bit and do bit by bit till it’s all closed. The elevated pillowed edge has become a bit flat over time because as you can see, my dog likes to put her body over it but with some stuffing in it, it’s good as new. Covers I change out and they’re easy to wash. We just purchased a 2nd bed for another home we loved it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Davis

customer_reviews.title: Overall probably the best pet bed I've purchased
customer_reviews.text: The only shortcoming is that the zipper they use is somewhat of a small gauge zipper, which makes it tedious to zip up. I purchased a second cover, thinking It would be great to just slip the dirty one off and put the clean one on... wrong... its quite an effort to put the covers on and off. You almost need three hands. If you are a normal human with two hands - plan on probably 5 minutes to zip up a clean cover. Again, a heavy duty zipper would make it much easier. Otherwise - a great product - withstands "nesting".
customer_reviews.author: Nawtikal

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Bed
customer_reviews.text: Bought XL for my 80lb labradoodle. It’s perfect! He likes to stretch out in bed, but still enjoys it for when he curls up, always utilizing the bolsters for his head. I was between buying a large vs XL, and the XL was definitely the right choice for him. I haven’t tried to wash the case, just spot cleaning. I use regular crib sheets to cover the bed and I change those weekly for him. The memory foam is similar to any regular mattress. Also, was very easy to put together. He loves his bed! I highly recommend. Make sure to buy some crib sheets for it, just makes things easier.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Holds up like a dream!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that this dog bed is fantastic, I could fall asleep on it! I purchased it a few years ago and it has held up unbelievable. This bed doesn't get smelly which is a problem when you have multiple dogs. All you have to do is unzip the cover and throw the cover in the washer. There is a liner over the memory foam that protects the mattress. This bed is expensive there's no getting around it, but I am glad I bought it. I highly recommend this bed. Thank you for a great product that does what is says!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Provides comfort and support.
customer_reviews.text: I had no trouble getting this set up. My only tip would be to be mindful of which zipper leads to which section! The bolster that some folks are complaining about the installation of was already zipped in mind. I actually managed to make it harder on myself by opening that section. In any case, it's a great balance between soft and firm, as you might guess based on the description and materials involved. It has been the favorite dog bed (my spoiled pup has 3!) since its arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Not quite soft enough
customer_reviews.text: The bed itself is of great quality. I can't complain about it. Now, for my dog personally, who is kind of a diva when it comes to softness, he gets it from me, this bed doesn't do it for him. I bought this to go in my office so he could sit with me, and also get rid of the red buffalo check blanket he would typically lay on. The only way he'll lay in this bed is with a soft blanket on top, haha. The feel of it truly isn't bad, but it is more of that outdoorsy material feel. So if you have a chewer this might be a great option.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Great for Senior dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for my senior 14 year old hound. I have 3 dogs and they all love it. Can fit all three of them on the jumbo. It is huge and takes up a lot of Space. Well worth it for my senior dog because she was having tough time getting herself up from the cheap bed we had for her. I immediately noticed a difference and it is so much easier for her to get up now. I am going to order another one smaller for another room. Expensive but after all the cheap ones I bought I wish I would have started with this one.
customer_reviews.author: IJK

customer_reviews.title: Dogs hate the smell of this bed, won't sleep in it
customer_reviews.text: It deserves no stars! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY, read the reviews!!!!! Too expensive for what it is. Seriously, with this bed there's something entirely wrong. All three of my dogs tried it out but after a sniff or two they are out and refuse to lay in it or go anywhere near it again. My dogs are in no way the "princess and the pea" types, they like all types of surfaces. Makes me think there is some type of toxic chemicals embedded in the filling or material. Will have to re-stuff if ever want to use. Horrible item.
customer_reviews.author: suzieQ

customer_reviews.title: Quality was Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: My Dog loves his bed. He acts like he's King of the Hill now. He was a gentle bull dog, pitiful rescue eat up with heart worms and congestive heart failure. Now he's a happy beloved boy with a new home and even his health is improving and if you go to move his bed he will jump in it and look at you like-Idk what you are doing~but I go wherever it goes🙃🤣. Excellent quality. I highly recommend these beds for dogs who have arthritis or any kind of joint problems too. I will purchase again. Came fast. Worth the price. My pup is pleased and that was enough for me. I got the Large. It's nice and roomy.🐕🐾💕🐾💕🐾💕🐾💕🐾💕🐾💕
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: Love the support provided in this pet bed - worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I have an 80 lb Lap/pit mix large breed dog that is 10 years old with arthritis. This bed provides great support for his large body type and head rest, he sleeps peacefully in this bed for hours at a time. I purchased the Medium size bed and it is big enough for him. The support provided in the mattress foam pad it great. This is our second bed of this same brand/make, the first one lasted for three years and was handed down to my cousins dog who is still happily using it and now they have matching beds which makes them happy cousin dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: We have been so impressed with our PetFusion dog bed. We have two Dogs. One is 80 pounds and the other is 60 pounds. Both dogs can sleep in the extra large bed comfortably. Our dogs love to pick up dog beds by their teeth and throw them around the room. Not this one! The way the corners curve and how the edges are set up, our dogs are not able to pick it up with their teeth. I would HIGHLY recommend this bed to anyone looking for something durable. Pros: Darker colors available Durable Easy to clean Dogs love it Long lasting Cons: Dirt can get stuck underneath the side padding
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Ann

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very high quality product. It took me about 15 minutes to put it together. I just wished they made a medium size 30x24 because that would be perfect for me. My dog is about 13lbs and he loves to stretch out when he sleeps so I figured I will go with the large. It takes up a lot of space in my small apartment but at least I have my bed back
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Get this bed - your dog will love it and you!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is obsessed with this bed. I have a 12 year old beagle - he’s not arthritic yet - but he was very accustomed to sleeping on the couch with me. When we bought a new couch that he wasn’t allowed on, I wanted him to have a comfortable option... well this bed is amazing. He prefers it to everything else - you’ve never heard a dog snore like he does on this thing. I threw a fleece blanket on top so that I don’t have to take it apart to clean it - but it’s really wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy/ nice quality for price
customer_reviews.text: My doggo loves this. He's a bulldog with sleep apnea, so he needs to elevate his head to breath when he sleeps. The edges of this bed help with that. The memory foam is great for his joints. I like that there is a waterproof cover for the mattress as my dog has occasional accidents. It's easy to assemble and easy to clean. If you have a slobbery dog, you might want to get a lighter color than I did. His slobber stains cover the whole thing after 1 day. A lighter color would hide that. I got a size large, but a medium probably would have worked for us. It was larger than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Brittni

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo is huge very comfy
customer_reviews.text: My pit bull (90+) was getting up at night From his Old bed And going to the couch. His old bed from “Arkarat” had about a year it had a good long run. however, it was beginning to sink in the middle so I wanted to invest in a new one. I got the jumbo size because I spoil this cutie pie and wanted him to be comfortable this size honestly you can fit two pit bulls In it but atleast if he wants to lay out he has all the space he wants. I’m very satisfied with the bed. So far he seems to love it so I’m happy I even lay in it very comfy the memory foam
customer_reviews.author: Abi

customer_reviews.title: Not a calming bed.
customer_reviews.text: The description states that this is "Calming bed for dogs who suffer from anxiety" but it was anything but for my dog. The bolsters made her feel trapped and they are not removable. I asked for a return and it was allowed, but I was surprised with the $25 dollar restocking fee which comes out to 20%. Nowhere during the return process did it state the fee. I had to look it up after I obtained my reduced return amount.
customer_reviews.author: R.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves this new bed. It is a great size and she likes the bolster around the edges which gives her something to rest her head on. We covered it in blankets so it is easy to clean. It's a bit pricey but hoping it lasts as she really enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Greyhound approved!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product! Not heavy like other memory foam beds. Holding up very well under the weight of this couch potato; no sagging.
customer_reviews.author: K. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the perfect bed for my husky
customer_reviews.text: My husky loves it. I wanted a good memory foam bed for her and this ones great. The only thing is she didn’t take to it until the odor from the memory foam dissipated. A few days. Memory foam always smells funky. I wish they would have deodorized it prior. Eventually my dog took to it. It’s cute. The color is a little more gray than vanilla but oh well still cute. Great quality. Highly recommend. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: benny b

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, firm but comfy bed
customer_reviews.text: I really am happy I bought this bed for my pup. He had a pretty rotten bed and avoided it and now he likes to curl up in his new bed with his new soft blanket. The bed is very easy to put together and the cotton cloth easily comes off for washing. The mattress is excellent and firm but still is comfortable and it is designed for doggies that enjoy putting their head on a resting place (the rim of the bed) a little higher than the bed itself. I feel like a good mom now!!
customer_reviews.author: BarbarainAustin

customer_reviews.title: Quality Dog Bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 12 year old Australian Shepherd who was suffering with extreme Arthritis. Got her the Jumbo size which was really overkill as it was very large but she could really stretch out in it. She used this everyday for the last year before she passed away. It was easy for her to get in and out of it, as it wasn't too soft, just very supportive. Expensive but as other reviewers say worth every penny as it's a total quality product, and I believe made her much more comfortable in her last days.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Frequent Washing. Love this bed!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed! My dog has degenerative myelopathy. She is in this bed a lot. She has trouble repositioning herself and the great quality of this mattress prevents bedsore on her boney hips. She has some bladder leakage. The bed whisks urine away and the spots dry and are not visible. We wash it at least weekly, sometimes daily. I have owned this bed for 7 months of this treatment and it still looks new. The zippers zip well, are easy to use. Reassembles easily and looks nice. Great quality, well thought out bed. What a dog bed should be. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Lovellette

customer_reviews.title: Best dog bed yet
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love this bed. It's big enough for our two medium size dogs to sleep on together, even with both all stretched out. This is the best dog bed we've had in over 20 years. The construction is designed to keep it water resistant and the materials are all excellent quality. Absolutely worth the price. Your dogs will love you for it.
customer_reviews.author: PugMom99

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed for the dog.
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick orthopedic foam pad. It is the thickest I have see so far and the dog loves it. Not difficult to assemble unless your dog is trying to help you. It is helpful to try and assemble before the foam expands completely, mine was about 10 min to expand. I got the jumbo just be warned it is a bit big for my Lab but she has many sleeping positions depending on her mood and likes to rest her head on the bolsters while stretching out. I thought the fabric could be a little sturdier but I will wait a few months and see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Great but not mildew resistant
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this bed. Unfortunately it ruined my hardwood floor and has small spots of mildew on the inner waterproof liner. The liner is removable and can be washed but lesson learned use this with a barrier underneath or on an elevated bed.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof??? No!!
customer_reviews.text: They are not water proof my dogs urinated on them it soaked to the foam ruining them
customer_reviews.author: Cinster

customer_reviews.title: Top quality dog bed that’s stylish too
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the nicest, most well made dog bed I’ve purchased. The memory foam is really heavy and I like that’s it more of a canvas material than fuzzy. Our aussiedoodles get hot easily on fleecy beds, but this works great. They snuggled up on it immediately. Def worth the money. For reference, this is the large size and they are about 15 lbs each.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S.

customer_reviews.title: Money Well Spent
customer_reviews.text: I just now received and opened this item so I cannot speak of durability. However, I am thoroughly impressed with the quality and well thought design. The memory foam is thick, and comes with a protective cover. The bolster arms are cushy. I had a very difficult time deciding on what size to purchase. After reading many reviews I decided on the XL for my 70lb dog which in my opinion is perfect. Plenty of space for Winston to stretch out at night. As some others have done I have decided to also purchase a wooden frame which has not yet arrived. Winston will soon be living like a king!
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Beds are fantastic!  Dogs fight over them.  Now I have to get three more for dane squad
customer_reviews.text: This bed is phenomenal. We have four danes and one of them just had surgery and we wanted him to be comfortable when he was not on the couch or bed (person bed). We have other dog beds which I thought were pretty good but the dogs thought otherwise. They fight for this bed. The puppy wont budge so I have to move him so his brother can have the good bed as he is the one that had the surgery. Bad news is now I have to buy three more. They aint cheap but worth every penny. These beds are EXCELLENT. Danes all weigh 175+ so we need a solid bed.
customer_reviews.author: Atlantic Capital

customer_reviews.title: Best bed ever! Ordering another.
customer_reviews.text: This product exceeded my expectations. I also ordered another brand very similar and it was a huge disappointment. Great zippers, construction, nice cover tweed like. My dog was trying to get in before I had assembled. Many, many beds over many years and this is terrific especially for easy wash. I wasn’t sure if small would work and their seems to be no medium. It’s a perfect size for my Cavalier. Great cuddle and also room to stretch out. I am ordering a second one. Great design and execution. Love waterproof liners also in bolsters. So easy to wash. And the Cavalier loves her new bed. She was in the bed the first time and gave me a kiss.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: High quality and my super picky Yorkie loves it
customer_reviews.text: I just got this bed and so far both me and my dog love it. It looks like it's high quality (unlike most of the dog beds sold in pet stores), it even requires assembly when it arrives. I got the large brown one for my Yorkie (he likes the space) who has spine problems. I've never seen him sleep as well, he stays still for much longer. And after just a few days I can see he's in a lot less pain and is just healthier in general. Wish I found this earlier, my dog rejected all the other beds I ever got him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!  The Company stands behind their product.
customer_reviews.text: First, my dog loves the bed. She is a Great Dane and it is hard to find a bed that works for her, but this one is great. The cover is heavy duty and it can be washed. The foam is great quality and has not lost its shape. I did have an issue with the cover at the front seam - it was coming apart. I emailed the company directly, they emailed me back and I talked with them about the issue and showed them a photo. They sent me a new bed - no questions asked. I only expected a replacement cover and they went above and beyond. Great company that stands behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Reid

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to clean and too bulky
customer_reviews.text: Fabric and nooks and crannies are hard to keep clean for a dog that sheds, Bulky size and heavy in comparison to flat dog mattresses/beds with no bolsters.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and comfort so far
customer_reviews.text: I was worried this bed would be too small for my adult 80lb German Shepherd, but he seems to enjoy it in both comfort and size. My toddler enjoyed sitting in there with him. We've only had it for a few days so I can't et comment on structural integrity. The chemical smell from other comments seemed to either be non-existent to minimal for me so I didn't need to spend 2 days airing it out as others said they did. It was easy to assemble when putting it together immediately out of the box before it fully exposed.
customer_reviews.author: inez dixon

customer_reviews.title: Great dog bed, holds up like a dream
customer_reviews.text: My dog adores this bed. I also love it because it's incredibly easy to clean and the memory foam pad has a waterproof cover that actually works. I have a dog that will pee when stressed and the cover has continually kept up over multiple messes and multiple washes. No damage done to the actual memory foam. She also digs when stressed and I'm happy to report that we haven't had a single tear in this bed.
customer_reviews.author: G. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress, sturdy, terrible cover, gets dirty
customer_reviews.text: Got dirty by the puppy within a week, he didn’t pee or poop or throw up on it, just daily use. Stains not coming off and it’s nearly impossible, very hard work to remove the cover, wash it and put it back. Very soft and great to sleep on. Terrible long term, looks terrible when dirty, it smells and can’t be washed easily. Wish I could return it but i let too much time pass, trying to live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Konstantinos Zenelis

customer_reviews.title: Best pet bed on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is our second purchase of a Pet Fusion bed so that we could have a smaller bed in the bedroom as our adopted pitbull kept sneaking down the hall to our room to sleep at night. These beds are high quality, durable and super comfortable for our pets. We even find our two cats in it from time to time. It is simple to clean. We highly recommend purchasing one if you're looking for a bed that will last a very long time. Worth the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah B.

customer_reviews.title: My boys love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My big boys LOVE this bed!!! They’re both 9 year old Siberian huskies who love lounging around. The orthopedic support this bed provides is just what the doctor ordered. They prefer it over anything else. Both are about 100 lbs and both have had surgeries on their knees over the last couple of years. Honestly, the XL size might have been good enough for just one pup but since both snuggle up on it together at times, I’m definitely glad I got the jumbo size. It is enormous!!! It takes up a lot of space, but I’m just happy that they’re happy. Small inconvenience in exchange for their maximum comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quality, accurate color (sandstone). I love that everything is washable and foam has an additional cover. It’s heavy enough it doesn’t slide on wood floor. Very good thick quality foam. My dog loved it right away and she’s normally picky. She does not chew, but if your dog does it might not hold up since it’s fabric. Overall 10 out of 10. For any dog that needs a thick cushy bed this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Downing

customer_reviews.title: My old dog LOVES THIS BED!
customer_reviews.text: My old dog loves this bed! He is 14 and needed a THICK memory foam mattress that didn't sink to the bottom as he slept in it. THIS ONE IS PERFECT! He isn't a chewer so I don't know how resistant it is to chewing but the canvas material is very "upholstered" to the shape of the bed so no loose corners to get too. The zippers are high quality too. LOVE IT because my BEST PAL LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Penelope

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed
customer_reviews.text: Got one for my senior dog he loves it. Have had it for 3 years now and it still has nice thick padding. Adopted another dog from pound and he didn't like his bed he kept getting onto the Pet Fusion bed so ordered one for him and one for a friends dog. Nice thick pad and room for my 57lb. dogs.
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: My Girl Loves It
customer_reviews.text: This bed is great! Our 70 lb Lab mix loves this bed! It's very supportive for her 11 1/2 yr old joints. She is cold natured so she is able to curl up and get warm in this bed quite well. I really like the way the cover comes off to be able to wash. I also have a crib sheet over the bed to help cut down on washing to cover to make it last even longer!! I highly recommend this bed!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley L. Davis

product_meta.title: PetFusion Ultimate Dog Bed, CertiPUR-US Orthopedic Memory Foam, Size/Color Options, Medium Firmness Pillow, Waterproof Liner, YKK Zippers, Breathable 35% Cotton, Cert. Skin Contact Safe, 3yr. Warranty
